0.name: Vox Harmonique, Opus Cosmique
0.fullDesc:
Robin enters the Concerto state and makes all other allies immediately take action.
While in the Concerto state, increases all allies' ATK by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of Robin's ATK plus <orangeStrong>{{3}}</orangeStrong>. Moreover, after every attack by allies, Robin deals <u>Additional Physical DMG</u> equal to <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of her ATK for 1 time, with a fixed CRIT Rate for this damage set at {{5, percent}}% and fixed CRIT DMG set at {{6, percent}}%.
While in the Concerto state, Robin is immune to <u>Crowd Control debuffs</u> and cannot enter her turn or take action until the Concerto state ends.
A Concerto countdown appears on the Action Order bar. When the countdown's turn begins, Robin exits the Concerto state and immediately takes action. The countdown has its own fixed SPD of {{2}}.
0.shortDesc: Enters the Concerto state, <orangeStrong>increases all allies' ATK</orangeStrong>, and causes all teammates to immediately take action. After an attack, Robin deals <orangeStrong><u>Additional Physical DMG</u></orangeStrong>. While Concerto lasts, Robin is immune to <u>Crowd Control debuffs</u>. Before Concerto ends, Robin won't take turn or action, lasting until the end of the countdown.

0.name: Overture of Inebriation
0.fullDesc: After using Technique, creates a special dimension around the character that lasts for {{1}} seconds. Enemies within this dimension will not attack Robin and will follow Robin while the dimension is active. After entering battle while the dimension is active, Robin regenerates {{2}} Energy at the start of each wave. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
0.shortDesc: Creates a special dimension around the character. Enemies within this dimension will not attack Robin. After entering battle while the dimension is active, Robin additionally regenerates <orangeStrong>{{2}}</orangeStrong> Energy at the start of each wave.
